link:linkbase.xsi:schemaLocation: http://www.xbrl.org/2003/linkbase http://www.xbrl.org/2003/xbrl-linkbase-2003-12-31.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/generic http://www.xbrl.org/2008/generic-link.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/boolean http://www.xbrl.org/2008/boolean-filter.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/formula http://www.xbrl.org/2008/formula.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/assertion/consistency http://www.xbrl.org/2008/consistency-assertion.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/assertion/existence http://www.xbrl.org/2008/existence-assertion.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/assertion/value http://www.xbrl.org/2008/value-assertion.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/variable http://www.xbrl.org/2008/variable.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/period http://www.xbrl.org/2008/period-filter.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/concept http://www.xbrl.org/2008/concept-filter.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/tuple http://www.xbrl.org/2008/tuple-filter.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/dimension http://www.xbrl.org/2008/dimension-filter.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/general http://www.xbrl.org/2008/general-filter.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/label http://www.xbrl.org/2008/generic-label.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/validation http://www.xbrl.org/2008/validation.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/unit http://www.xbrl.org/2008/unit-filter.xsd http://xbrl.org/2010/message http://www.xbrl.org/2010/generic-message.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/match http://www.xbrl.org/2008/match-filter.xsd

generic:link.msg:message: Identity "Cash Funds=1.1 Cash in hand+ 1.2 Cash with Business Correspondents + I.3 Balances/Deposits with RBI" do not tally.
Identity "Balances/Deposits with RBI =1.3.1 Out of Demand Deposit Balances (DDBs) + 1.3.2 Out of Own Funds" do not tally.
Identity "Dues from Banks / CCPs=2.1 Balances in Current accounts +2.2 Money at call and short notice+ 2.3 Placements/ Time Deposits + 2.3 Placements/ Time Deposits" do not tally.
Identity "SLR / Approved securities =3.1 GOI treasury bills + 3.2 GOI (dated) securities + 3.3 State Government securities + 3.4 Other approved securities" do not tally.

Identity "Other debt securities= 4.1 Bonds of banks/FIs + 4.2 Bonds of PSUs+ 4.3 Infrastructure Bonds and Debentures+ 4.4 Venture Capital Funds+ 4.5 Assets backed Securities+ 4.6 Bonds and Debentures of NBFCs+ 4.7 Bonds and debentures of other corporates+ 4.8 Bank certificates of deposit (CDs)+ 4.9 Commercial paper +4.10 Mutual Funds - Debt Oriented and Others + 4.10 Mutual Funds - Debt Oriented + 4.11 Others" do not tally.
Identity "Assets backed Securities =4.5.1 Mortgage backed Securities + 4.5.2 Securities issued by ARCs + 4.5.3 Others" do not tally.
Identity "Equities =5.1 Shares – PSUs+ 5.2 Shares - other corporates +5.3 Mutual Funds - Equity Oriented +5.4 Venture Capital Funds+ 5.5 Shares – NBFCs + 5.6 Others" do not tally.

Identity "Other Assets s=6.1 Interest accrued+ 6.2 Advance tax paid and TDS (net)+ 6.3 Amounts due from RBI +6.4 Inter-branch adjustment a/c (net) + 6.5 Sundry debtors +6.6 Staff advances + 6.7 Deferred Tax Assets + 6.8 Gross positive MTM Values of Derivatives + 6.9 All others - pl specify" do not tally.
Identity "Fixed Assets (net) =7.1 Premises / office buildings+ 7.2 Computer hardware +7.3 Computer software + 7.4 Office equipments / fittings)" do not tally.

Identity "Total Assets =1. Cash Funds + 2. Dues from Banks / CCPs + 3.SLR / Approved securities + 4. Other debt securities, 5.Equities + 6. Other Assets+ 7.Fixed Assets (net) + 8. Intangible Assets)" do not tally.
Identity "Total= (Out of DDBs + Out of Own Funds)" do not tally.

Identity "Reserves (Disclosed) =3.1 Share Premium Account+ 3.2 Statutory Reserves+3.3 General Reserves+3.4 Special Reserves u/s 36(1)(viii) of Income Tax Act+ 3.5 Capital Reserves (excl. Revaluation Reserves)+3.6 Other Revenue Reserves+3.7 Investment Reserves + 3.8 Revaluation Reserves)" do not tally.

Identity "Total Capital and Reserves =(1. Paid-up Equity Share Capital + 2. Other eligible capital instruments + 3. Reserves (Disclosed) + 4.Surplus - unallocated and carried over - 5. Accumulated losses of previous years + 6. Operating Surplus in Current Year - 7. Operating Deficit in Current Year + 8. Undisclosed reserves + 9. General Provisions)" do not tally.

Identity "Net worth = (10. Total Capital and Reserves - 3.8 Revaluation Reserves - 8. Undisclosed reserves - 9. General Provisions - 11. Intangible Assets plus positive Value (Net of DTA and DTL))" do not tally.
Identity "Total Deposits =Customer Deposits + Deposits of Banks" do not tally.
Identity "Customer Deposits = Current Accounts + Saving Accounts" do not tally.
Identity "Current accounts =(1.1.1 Individuals + 1.1.2 Micro and small enterprises + 1.1.3 Medium enterprises + 1.1.4 Large enterprises)" do not tally.
Identity "Savings accounts = Individuals + Others" do not tally.

Identity "Total Borrowings = (2.1 Borrowings (Credit Institutions) + 2.2 Borrowings (Capital Market) + 2.3 Sub -ordinated Debts + 2.4 Long Term Bonds + 2.5 Long term loans from multilateral agencies + 2.6 Hybrid Capital" do not tally.

Identity "Borrowings (Credit Institutions) = (2.1.1 In inter-bank market (call/notice) + 2.1.2 From Reserve Bank of India + .2.1.3 From Banks in India + 2.1.4 From Central Counter Parties (CCPs) + 2.1.5 From Financial Institutions)" do not tally.
Identity "Borrowings (Capital Market) =(2.2.1 By issue of bonds + 2.2.2 By issue of debt paper)" do not tally.
Identity "Sub -ordinated Debts = (2.3.1 Due in five years + 2.3.2 Due after five years)" do not tally.

Identity "Other liabilities = (3.1 Interest accrued/payable (provision) + 3.2 Provision for taxes (net) + 3.3 Inter-branch adjustment a/c (net) + 3.4 Bills payable + 3.5 Unspent balances in Prepaid Instruments + 3.6 Security deposits from BCs + 3.7 Security deposits / earnest money deposits from other service providers + 3.8 All others)" do not tally.
Identity "All others =(3.8.1 Other Surpluses + 3.8.2 Deferred Tax Liabilities + 3.8.3 Gross Negative MTM Value of Derivatives + 3.8.4 Any other - Pls specify)" do not tally.
Identity "Risk provisions (other than netted off assets) = (4.1 For investments + 4.2 For other impaired assets + 4.3 Any other provisions - pl specify)" do not tally.
Identity "Total liabilities =(I. Total Deposits ( I.1 + I.2) + 2. Total Borrowings (2.1 to 2.6) + 3. Other liabilities + 4. Risk provisions (other than netted off assets))" do not tally.

Identity "Contingent liabilities= (B1.1 Sale and repurchase agreements + B1.2 Liability on account of partly paid securities + B1.3 Claims against the bank not acknowledged as debt + B1.4 Other items in respect of which the bank is contingently liable + B1.5 Any other contingent liability - pl specify)" do not tally.
Identity "Futures = (B2.2.1 Currency futures + B2.2.2 Interest rate futures)" do not tally.
Identity "Swaps = (B2.4.1 Single currency interest rate swaps (not involving INR) + B2.4.2 FCY / INR interest rate swaps)" do not tally.
Identity "Swaps - interest rate = (B2.5.1 Single currency interest rate swaps + B2.5.2 Basis swaps)" do not tally.
Identity "Total derivatives =(B2.1 Forward forex contracts + B2.2 Futures +B2.3 Forward rate agreements + B2.4 Swaps + B2.5 Swaps - interest rate + B2.6 Any other, pl specify)" do not tally.
Identity "Total Pending reconciliation entries = sum of period buckets" do not tally.
Identity "Total Assets =(10.Tota Capital and Reserves (1 to 4 - 5 + 6 - 7 + 8 + 9) + 5. Total liabilities (without Total Capital & Reserves))" do not tally
Identity "Total Assets=Interest Earning Assets + Other Earning Assets + Non-Earning Assets" do not tally.
Identity "Total Assets=Interest Earning Assets + Other Earning Assets + Non-Earning Assets" do not tally.
Identity "Interest bearning liabilities <= total liabilities" do not tally.
